tool_description: The mysms team strives to change the way we communicate today. Communication is everywhere and should not be locked to one single phone. mysms aims to make messaging easier and fully independent from an individual platform.
name: MySMS
title: MySMS

api_list.name: AttachmentAllowMsisdns
api_list.description: Adds allowed msisdn's who has read access to the attachment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mysms.p.rapidapi.com/rest/attachment/allow/msisdns"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mysms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: UserCreate
api_list.description: Creates an new user with a verified mobile number. The API Key needs the right to do that.
api_list.code:
